thread.title: Sophie Turner on Train Duty for Maisie Williams Is BFF Goals
thread.title_full: Sophie Turner on Train Duty for Maisie Williams Is BFF Goals

title: Sophie Turner on Train Duty for Maisie Williams Is BFF Goals
text: By Kristina Rodulfo Jan 8, 2017 It's no secret that Game of Thrones co-stars Maisie Williams and Sophie Turner–aka Arya and Sansa Stark–are IRL best friends. A photo posted by Maisie Williams (@maisie_williams) on Jan 8, 2017 at 8:01am PST   The two arrived together at the Golden Globes, of course, and their sister-like bond was on full display. As Maisie was making her way up the red carpet to get photographed, Sophie made sure she looked A+ by fixing the train on her dress to fan out just right: Getty
